scripts.deploy-server: now deploy server | node -e "process.stdin.on('data', chunk => { var line = chunk.toString('utf8'); if(/Ready\!/.test(line)) process.stdout.write(line.match(/(https\:\S+)/)[0]+'/'); });" > SERVER_URI
scripts.build-client: cpx -C 'client/**/*.{html,png,jpg}' www && browserify -t rollupify -t bubleify -t brfs -t uglifyify client/app.js -o www/app.js
scripts.deploy-client-gh: git add www && git commit -m 'update www' && echo 'www changes committed' || echo 'no changes to www' && git subtree push --prefix www . gh-pages && git push origin gh-pages:gh-pages
scripts.build-deploy-client: npm run build-client && npm run deploy-client-gh && npm run deploy-client-sh
scripts.build-deploy-all: npm run deploy-server && npm run build-deploy-client
